original: Friis, Hans Ludvig Eugen, stadsombudsman, Göteborg, f. 26/12/87 i V. Kärrstorp, Malmöh. 1., av godsäg. Anders F. o, Elise Pauline Zeller. G. 18 m. Ebba Lindqvist-Wahlström. Barn: Elsie f. 19. — Stud:ex. 08, jur. kand. 13. E. o. not. i Svea o, GÖta hovr,, tjg. v. olika doms. 13-16, bitr. jur. å adv :byrå 16, komm :omb :man i Örgry-te i Gbg 17-21, omb :man o. sekr. h. Gbgs stads hälsov:nd fr. 22, ekonomichef o. dir. f. Gbgs stads sjukv:inr. 24-30, omb :man h. sjukh :direkt. sed. 33. Ordf. i hyresnd f. vissa omr. 18-21, led. av Sv. eldbegäng :fören. Gbgs-avd. sed. 36 o. av Sv. eldbegäng iförsàkr ikassans (lokalavd. i Gbg sed, 32, led, av o, sekr, i ett flert. komm. o. beredn. sed. 22. RVO 40.
translated: Friis, Hans Ludvig Eugen, city attorney, Gothenburg, born on December 26, 1887 in West Kärrstorp, Malmöhus County, son of landowner Anders F. and Elise Pauline Zeller. Married in 1918 to Ebba Lindqvist-Wahlström and they have one child, Elsie, born in 1919. Hans completed his secondary education in 1908 and received his law degree in 1913. He worked as an acting notary in the courts of Svea and Göta from 1913 to 1916, associate attorney at a law firm in 1916, municipal attorney in Örgryte in Gothenburg from 1917 to 1921, and as a municipal attorney and secretary of the Gothenburg City Health Board from 1922 onwards. From 1924 to 1930, he served as the director of finance and director of the Gothenburg City Hospital, and thereafter as a member of the hospital board of directors. He was chairman of the housing board for certain areas from 1918 to 1921, and a member of the Swedish Cremation Association in Gothenburg from 1936, as well as of the Swedish Cremation Insurance Association (local chapter of Gothenburg since 1932), and a member and secretary of several committees and commissions since 1922. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in 1940.
